Sentencas: We synthesized various sizes of nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) for an electrolyte in solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) by using the sol-gel method.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia for an electrolyte in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The surface morphology and the thermo-mechanical properties for different nano-grain sizes were characterized.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia for an electrolyte in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The YSZ grains were found to grow non-linearly, as well as non-logarithmically, with increasing sintering temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia for an electrolyte in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The surface morphology shows that the grains of nano-sized YSZ are well dispersed in the measured area, with a narrow size distribution and without significant aggregation.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia for an electrolyte in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The values of the thermal expansion coefficient of nano-grain YSZ obtained in this study are close to those of the other components of the electrodes and the interconnects used in the SOFC.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia for an electrolyte in a solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The effect of the grain size on the thermo-mechanical property is also found to be negligible.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized zirconia for an electrolyte in a solid-oxide fuel cell
